question: who sings you're welcome in moana credits
api_result: In the credits of the Disney animated film "Moana," the song "You're Welcome" is performed by Jordan Fisher featuring Lin-Manuel Miranda. Lin-Manuel Miranda, who is one of the songwriters for the film, also provides additional vocals in this version of the song. In the movie itself, the character Maui sings "You're Welcome," and he is voiced by Dwayne Johnson.
